person.persName: P. P. Ballard (Hotel Keeper, Madison County)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Ballard on April 16, 1840. Father of Sally Ballard, Bettie Ballard, Catharine Ballard, John Ballard, Rosa Ballard, Bland Ballard, and Walter Ballard. Hotel keeper in Madison County in 1860.
